promptPrefix: Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to respond only in  [TARGETLANGUAGE]. I want you to act as a proficient SEO copywriter. Your task is to create a content plan and a keyword strategy for an article about [PROMPT] intended for laypeople. The article should be SEO optimized, incorporating keywords such as '[PROMPT]', 'symptoms', 'treatment', 'overview', 'which doctor to seek' and 'causes', among others that you find relevant. The structure of the article should include an introduction or overview, a body of text detailing what is [PROMPT], its symptoms, causes, and treatment options, and information about which doctor to seek, ending with a conclusion. Seek to add one or more topics that are creative, practical examples, or analogies. All output shall be in  [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Content for laypeople - Disease -
